## PublishingService.getPublishUrls() method

Gets the URL where an item is published. This operation returns an instance of 'PublishUrlInfo' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getPublishUrls(escapedPageId: string): CancelablePromise<Array<PublishUrlInfo>>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type   | Description                                                                                        |
| ------------- | ------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| escapedPageId | string | The TCM URI of a Page with the colon escaped by replacing it with an underscore. E.g. "tcm_1-1-7". |

**Returns:**

[CancelablePromise](./open-api-client.cancelablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;Array&lt;[PublishUrlInfo](./open-api-client.publishurlinfo.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

PublishUrlInfo The request was successful.

## Exceptions

ApiError
